snippet: The stage adaptation of "Flashdance," based on the 1983 movie about a female welder-turned-dancer, will begin performances on Broadway in August 2013.
abstract: The stage adaptation of "Flashdance," based on the 1983 movie about a female welder-turned-dancer, will begin performances on Broadway in August 2013.

headline.main: 'Flashdance' Musical Set for Broadway in August 2013
headline.print_headline: ‘Flashdance’ Now Aims for Broadway in August
